title: Japan Bourse to Boost JGB Futures Liquidity as Volatility Rises
description: Osaka Exchange Inc. is considering changes aimed at boosting foreign participation in its 20-year Japanese government bond futures, as surging volatility in the world’s third-largest debt market drives trading in the contracts to record levels.
content: Osaka Exchange Inc. is considering changes aimed at boosting foreign participation in its 20-year Japanese government bond futures, as surging volatility in the world’s third-largest debt market drives trading in the contracts to record levels.
